short_description:
IRC Chat Bots 2014 (Mini Vip Pro Edition) FREE

English - Information: 
Add Proxies, Add Word, Add Accounts
Add Proxy List, Add Word List, Add Account List
For more Information watch our Video Tutorials
Auto-Rotation Proxy, Word + Accounts with custom Timer Function (e.g. 30 seconds)

German - Information: 
Proxies adden, Wörter adden, Accounts adden
Proxy Listen adden, Wörter Listen adden, Account Listen adden
Automatische Proxy, Wort und Account Rotation mit eigen einstellbaren Timer (z.B. 30 Sekunden)

Für mehr Information unsere Video Tutorials angucken

OAuth Website :
(There you can generate OAuth for your Accounts)
(Da könnt ihr eure OAuths für eure Accounts erstellen)
http://twitchapps.com/tmi/


By Pooria Sharaffodin - www.BabaTools.com - Have Fun - Viel Spaß

Visit for more Tools, Videos, Information, Tutorials:
http://www.BabaTools.com
http://www.Sharaffodin.de
summary: Auto-Rotation Proxy, Word + Accounts with custom Timer Function
